class.name: VoxelGeneratorNoise2D
class.brief_description: Voxel generator producing noise-based heightmap terrain.

members.member: When assigned, this curve will alter the distribution of height variations, allowing to give some kind of "profile" to the generated shapes. By default, a linear curve from 0 to 1 is used.
Noise used to produce the heightmap. It is required for the generator to work.
